### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(12.5, 13.5)
Consists of the following entities:
-  Electric pole at position(12.5, 13.5)
-  Electric pole at position(15.5, 15.5)
-  Electric pole at position(11.5, 13.5)
-  Electric pole at position(20.5, 10.5)
-  Electric pole at position(9.5, 13.5)
-  Electric pole at position(10.5, 13.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
-  Furnace at position(0.0, 0.0)
-  Furnace at position(2.0, 0.0)
-  Furnace at position(2.0, 2.0)

### Wooden chest at position(5.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
-  Wooden chest at position(5.5, 0.5)

### Lab at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
-  Lab at position(0, 0)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to insufficient ingredients in furnaces
- Ensure that you have enough raw materials in the inventory to keep furnaces operational. Check the input requirements for each furnace and gather the necessary resources before starting operations.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities in the target area.

### Errors related to power supply for lab
- Ensure that the lab is connected to a power source. Check the electrical connections and make sure there is sufficient power available for the lab to operate.
